name: Luna ALPHA
description:
An early prototype for a game I'm working on that I thought I'd release so people can give it a try. It's very buggy, so keep that in mind before you complain.

-Controls-

(Edit mode)

  • LMB - Place wall 
  • RMB - Place Turret
  • MMB - Place Auto Turret
  • Space - Spawn in enemies and enter play mode

(Play mode)

  • RMB - Select Normal Turret
  • LMB - Shoot

This game will continue to be updated until the end of ALPHA, then you will have to sign up to beta test it. Full release version will be payed (probably) but there will be a free demo.
